/taskData/data: Ahead of 2021/2022 Serie A TIM's 28th Round matches, here are the standout facts on each match.
SERIE A TIM, MATCHWEEK 28 - STATS AND FACTS
The award will be presented to Napoli coach in the pre-match of Napoli vs Milan
LUCIANO SPALLETTI COACH OF THE MONTH FOR FEBRUARY
Happy birthday to Antonio Sanabria, Torino forward, born in San Lorenzo (Paraguay) in 1996.

* Milan have won only one of their last 14 Serie A meetings with Napoli (3-1 away from home on 22nd November 2020) and in this period they have suffered eight defeats (D5), including losing each of the last two (both 0-1).
Click HERE to know the names of the Referees of the 2021/2022 Serie A TIM's Matchweek 28.
SERIE A TIM, THE REFEREES FOR THE 28TH ROUND
ALLEGRI\n\We must congratulate Fiorentina because they played a good match. It was a tough game where we suffered on the counterattacks and sometimes we were even lucky
column5: but the team held their shape well and in normal situations we didn't risk much
column6: defending with order and with a high line. We also had favourable situations in which we could have been more dangerous
column7: but winning in Florence is never easy and the team showed signs of maturity
column8: because today we were missing so many players and it was a difficult match. Ak√© did well too
column10: but I think Danilo has set an example
column11: proving to be a player of the highest level. Fortunately
column13: Rugani and Bernardeschi are back tomorrow and they will bring fresh energy. Now let's put this match aside
column14: because on Sunday we have a very important match against Spezia.\""

/taskData/data: Happy birthday to Bryan Cristante, Roma midfielder, born in San Vito al Tagliamento in 1995.
